channel.title: Rsps 718 - adding ints for a new custom item

item.title: Rsps 718 - adding ints for a new custom item
item.dc:creator: @mohammedsirhan mohammedsirhan
item.description:
@mohammedsirhan wrote:

hello i just dont know where to put the ints…
its drygore rapier
here is picture of its look in the game
drygore is the last item near dagger

case 6505:
itemDef.modelid = 79233;
itemDef.name = “Main-hand Drygore Rapier”;
itemDef.description = “A Weapon Made From Kalphite Parts.”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1053;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 228;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 458;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 47;
itemDef.membersObject = true;
itemDef.anInt165 = 79234;
itemDef.anInt200 = 79234;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;
i dont know where in ItemDefinitions.java

Read full topic
item.source: Rsps 718 - adding ints for a new custom item
